topo

Class ConnectionList

  • java.lang.Object
    • topo.ConnectionList

  • public class ConnectionList
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds the information for all the connections in the network

      void addConnection(java.lang.String srcRouter, java.lang.String srcInterface, java.lang.String dstRouter, java.lang.String dstInterface)
      This method will add a connection to the ConnectionList based on the input parameters, then increment the number of connections.
      void addPacketIn(java.lang.String Router, java.lang.String Interface)
      This method increments the PacketIn counter for the specified connection

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConnectionList

        public ConnectionList()
        Constructor method for ConnectionList. The will create the blank list and Hashmap for indexes, and initalize the counter of connecitons

    • Method Detail

      • addConnection

        public void addConnection(java.lang.String srcRouter,
                 java.lang.String srcInterface,
                 java.lang.String dstRouter,
                 java.lang.String dstInterface)
        This method will add a connection to the ConnectionList based on the input parameters, then increment the number of connections. It will initalize the packet loss of this connection to 0%, as well as add a entry in the hashmap of indexes for both the source and destination router/inferface pair
        Parameters:
        srcRouter - - String of the source Router hostname
        srcInterface - - String of the source router interface
        dstRouter - - String of the destination router hostname
        dstInterface - - String of the destination router interface

      • printConnections

        public java.lang.String printConnections()
        This method will return all the connections in the ConnectionList in Cytoscape.js format
        Returns:
        String of all the connections and packetloss in the Cytoscape.js format

      • printLoss

        public java.lang.String printLoss()
        This method will return a string of each connections packetloss, only to be used for informational/logging purposes
        Returns:
        String of information for each connection

      • addPacketIn

        public void addPacketIn(java.lang.String Router,
               java.lang.String Interface)
        This method increments the PacketIn counter for the specified connection
        Parameters:
        Router - - String of the router's hostname
        Interface - - String of the router's interface

      • addPacketOut

        public void addPacketOut(java.lang.String Router,
                java.lang.String Interface)
        This method increments the PacketOut counter for the specified connection
        Parameters:
        Router - - String of the router's hostname
        Interface - - String of the router's interface
